short_summary: Soccer ball, stitch with middle stitch polyester yarn
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title

VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF

#### Reference Number

cb-8368-46705812

#### Solicitation Number

W8482-241975/A

#### Tender Opportunity Details

* **Publication Date**: August 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Agreement Details

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**: Applies to this tender opportunity
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the provision of Safety Relief Valves.

* **Items Required:**
	+ Item 1: 16 Safety Relief Valves, NSN: 01-151-8950, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 2: 16 Safety Relief Valves, NSN: 01-151-8950, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* **Product Details:** Please refer to the attachment for detailed product specifications
* **Equivalent or Substitute Products:** Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE they are offering
* **Canadian Content:** The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services
* **Currency:** Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* **Email**: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (819) 939-3674

Please download the complete tender notice from [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8368/rfp-w8482-241975-a-en.pdf), the official procurement portal for the Government of Canada.

Note that you have been informed that this tender announcement is now **Expired**.  This note is provided to keep you informed about the status of the government procurement contract that we were originally informed about. 

### ATTACHMENT
As specified above, please
